tool_description:
MotorsportApi has live coverage for most popular motorsports including MotoGP, Nascar, World Rally Championship, Moto2, Moto3, Superbike and Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft (DTM). 
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
title: MotorsportApi

api_list.name: StageHighlights
api_list.description: Get the highlights of a specific Motorsport stage.

required_parameters.name: stageId
required_parameters.description: The stage ID for which to retrieve the highlights.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motorsportapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/motorsport/stage/{stageid}/highlights"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motorsportapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Perform a search for Motorsport players, teams, and tournaments using the provided search term.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The search term to use for finding players, teams, and tournaments.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motorsportapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/motorsport/search/{term}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motorsportapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

}

api_list.name: TVCountries
api_list.description: Get a list of countries and their respective TV channels broadcasting a specific Football match.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motorsportapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/tv/country/all/event/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motorsportapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: TeamRaces
api_list.description: Get races for a specific Motorsport team during a stage season.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The team ID for which to retrieve the races.

required_parameters.name: seasonId
required_parameters.description: The stage season ID for which to retrieve the team's races.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motorsportapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/motorsport/team/{id}/stage/season/{seasonid}/races"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motorsportapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: MatchTvChannelDetails
api_list.description: Get the details of a specific TV channel broadcasting a specific Football match.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the match you want to retrieve the channel details for.

required_parameters.name: channId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the channel you want to retrieve the details for.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://motorsportapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/tv/channel/{channid}/event/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "motorsportapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
